name: too_demanding
description: You require very complex passwords that are impossible to memorize and you ask people to change them every month.
event: Your division sees the use of password generators. Some staff have also started to write their passwords on paper.
consequences: A newspaper article about Global Sparks shows someone's password in the background of the accompanying photograph.
impress-upper: Your policies should not demand so much of their users as to have them use external software.
impress-lower: Relax your policies to see a better performing division.
